dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Got the goods? 'Cause I know you wouldn't be wasting my time otherwise. Wink.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: As a matter of fact, I do.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Searched all over town. Couldn't find them. <Keep Drug Consumables>

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I got some questions.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Not yet.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: You do? I mean, you do! Of course, you do. What did I tell you? Sure. Fire. Delivery. System. Works almost every time!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's great. Now pay me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Sure... until someone comes along and rescues them from their pathetic lives.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Turns out some crazy guy was keeping them as pets.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Right, right. In my excitement, I very nearly forgot. Ha. Ha.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: As promised, your cut, plus a little extra to show my gratitude. Now if there's nothing else you need from me... I must go inventory my goods.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Was a pleasure doing business with you.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Sure they're raptidon fodder and suffer the occasional overdose when a container dissolves in their stomach aci- Wait, what do you mean "rescued" them?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Bertrand didn't appreciate the abuse they were suffering so he stole them from the tunnels.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: That deranged piece of sprat shit!

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: If Bertrand ain't already dead, he's about to be. I owe you for bringing this... breach in security to my attention.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Two guesses I know exactly who. And where to find him.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: They must've hightailed it out of town. Just my luck! I mean, sure, every scheme has its leaks to plug, but at this rate I'll be ruined.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: What am I gonna do now?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Pay me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Don't know, don't care. See you around.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Great! And now I'm in the red. Some scheme this turned out to be.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: No offense, but next time I think I'll go with someone else.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Hit me. I won't even hit back.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What do you do around here?

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Officially, I keep the books for Ms. Malin, provide loans to the Byzantium gold-bloods for gaming, and oversee our drug-running operations.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Speaking of... might I interest you in a purchase? I'll give you a first-time discount. That's five percent off and a free drink at the Ante Up. You're welcome.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll pass.

dialog.speaker: NelsonMayson (Male)
dialog.utterance: Suit yourself.
